biotools.summary: Replace Sam Header with the header from another sam file. The tool does not do any significant validation, so it's up to the user to make sure that the elements in the header are relevant and that the new header has all the required things.

bioschemas.name: picard_replacesamheader
bioschemas.summary: Replace Sam Header with the header from another sam file. The tool does not do any significant validation, so it's up to the user to make sure that the elements in the header are relevant and that the new header has all the required things.
